title: A First Draft
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419220126im_/http:/typophile.com/files/draft1_6613.png)

A first draft of an idea that was bouncing around my sketch book for a while. Obviously, I am having a bit of trouble envisioning the "Z". Any thoughts? Any references which might get me over the hump?
author: gene ullery-smith

comments.content: This has a very similar feel to [American Text](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419220126/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=BT.122208.0.0&attributes.sampleSize=74&sampleText=Z+is+for+zed&sampleSize=74). You could start there.

Thanks. That is very similar in feel. Perhaps i should push this in a different direction. Why reinvent the wheel? I'm thinking maybe making this a set of small caps, with a very large x-height. A set of coordinating dingbats might round out the font for poster usage. Should be done just in time for Halloween :)
